description: Catalog of all 52 educational payloads for Sonshine Christian Code Academy
scripture: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life. - John 3:16

payloads.title: Color Changer
payloads.description: Basic HTML/CSS/JS introduction - students create a dynamic color-changing page

payloads.title: Jesus Walks on Water
payloads.description: Tutorial teaching conditional logic and user input with a Biblical narrative

payloads.title: The Beatitudes
payloads.description: Tutorial introducing loops and arrays using the Beatitudes

payloads.title: The Lord's Prayer
payloads.description: Tutorial on working with objects in JavaScript using the Lord's Prayer structure

payloads.title: Scripture Memory Card
payloads.description: Interactive verse card with animations and scripture display

payloads.title: The Names of God
payloads.description: Tutorial exploring data structures using the various names of God in Scripture

payloads.title: The Ten Commandments
payloads.description: Tutorial on advanced array methods using the Ten Commandments

payloads.title: The Good Samaritan
payloads.description: Tutorial teaching error handling and try-catch blocks through a parable

payloads.title: The Sower and the Seeds
payloads.description: Tutorial on randomness and probability using the parable of the sower

payloads.title: RSA Encryption Demo
payloads.description: Complex interactive RSA encryption visualization with Tone.js audio feedback

payloads.title: The Fruits of the Spirit
payloads.description: Tutorial teaching async/await and promises using Biblical fruits metaphor

payloads.title: The Gifts of the Spirit
payloads.description: Tutorial on module imports and exports using spiritual gifts concept

payloads.title: The Tabernacle Dimensions
payloads.description: Tutorial introducing HTML and basic webpage structure with Biblical architecture

payloads.title: The Beatitudes Interactive
payloads.description: Tutorial on DOM manipulation and event listeners with interactive Beatitudes

payloads.title: Memory Verse Quiz
payloads.description: Tutorial building an interactive quiz app for memorizing Bible verses

payloads.title: Sowing to the Spirit (3D Car Game)
payloads.description: 3D driving game using Three.js - avoid temptation cars, stay under speed limit. NEEDS WORK - user reported issues.
payloads.notes: User indicated this didn't work well and could be modified

payloads.title: The Genealogy of Christ
payloads.description: Tutorial on database relationships using Christ's genealogy

payloads.title: The Book of Acts Timeline
payloads.description: Tutorial on database queries and filtering using Acts timeline data

payloads.title: The Twelve Tribes
payloads.description: Tutorial on one-to-many database relationships using the twelve tribes

payloads.title: Cloud of Witnesses
payloads.description: Tutorial teaching many-to-many database relationships with Biblical heroes

payloads.title: Paul's Missionary Journeys
payloads.description: Tutorial on complex SQL joins using Paul's missionary journey data

payloads.title: A Light on a Hill
payloads.description: Tutorial creating first web server with Bun.serve(). Introduction to client-server architecture

payloads.title: Book of Remembrance
payloads.description: Tutorial building a guestbook web application with form handling and database storage

payloads.title: Living Word
payloads.description: Tutorial creating a Bible verse reader server with dynamic content

payloads.title: Bible Jeopardy
payloads.description: Real-time multiplayer trivia game using WebSockets - includes Bun server and SQLite database

payloads.title: Personal Bible Commentary
payloads.description: Tutorial creating a web app to add personal notes to Bible verses

payloads.title: Parable Linker
payloads.description: Console tool to explore and link related Bible parables

payloads.title: Promise Box
payloads.description: Tutorial building a REST API server to serve random Bible promises

payloads.title: Proverbs Wisdom Jar
payloads.description: Tutorial building a full-stack web app to collect and display Proverbs

payloads.title: Don't Sin Darts
payloads.description: Fun dart-throwing game with sin/righteousness theme. Includes Project 2 boilerplate setup

payloads.title: Noah's Ark Sort
payloads.description: Fun matching game where players sort animals onto Noah's Ark

payloads.title: Jacob's Ladder
payloads.description: Fun timing-based game where players help Jacob climb a ladder. Deliberately difficult with adjustable settings

payloads.title: David's Aim
payloads.description: Fun slingshot aiming game where David faces Goliath. Includes adjustable difficulty

payloads.title: Day of Pentecost
payloads.description: Fix-the-code debugging challenge about speaking in tongues - fixing a hardcoded variable bug

payloads.title: The Broken Cistern
payloads.description: Debugging challenge to fix a SQL query selecting from wrong table name

payloads.title: The Ducky Mafia Investigation
payloads.description: Security investigation challenge - students crack plaintext passwords stored in database

payloads.title: The Securer Board
payloads.description: Security challenge - students use MD5 reverse lookup to crack hashed passwords

payloads.title: The Securer-er-er Board
payloads.description: Security challenge - students write brute-force tool to crack salted MD5 passwords

payloads.title: The Securer-er-er Board (Enhanced)
payloads.description: Enhanced version of salted MD5 brute-force challenge with improved password cracker

payloads.title: SQL Injection Investigation
payloads.description: Security tutorial teaching SQL injection attacks on vulnerable login system

payloads.title: Discerning the Weather
payloads.description: Fix-the-code challenge using weather API - students fix coordinates and format time strings

payloads.title: Gibeon Sun Timer
payloads.description: Fix-the-code challenge using sunrise/sunset API - students fix location and format times

payloads.title: Scripture Counselor
payloads.description: Fun interactive game where players match Bible verses to people's problems

payloads.title: The Narrow Path
payloads.description: Fix-the-code Canvas challenge game where player adjusts size to fit through narrow gaps

payloads.title: The Helper: Building Project 2
payloads.description: Tutorial teaching students how to use AI coding assistant (Grok) to build Project 2

payloads.title: Guest Instructor: Dayron
payloads.description: Guest instructor session with special Quest Coin challenge

payloads.title: Rightly Dividing
payloads.description: Fix-the-code word puzzle game about correctly dividing Bible terms

payloads.title: Operation: Decrypt the Scroll
payloads.description: Interactive Linux command-line tutorial using sed, tr, base64 to decode encrypted message

payloads.title: Feeding the Multitude
payloads.description: Fun game collecting bread/fish. Includes Project 3 boilerplate (Bible verse sharing app)

payloads.title: The Lighthouse
payloads.description: Fun game with physics-based light beam control to guide ships safely

payloads.title: Fisher of Men
payloads.description: Fun fishing game with pendulum physics mechanics

payloads.title: The Faithful Servant's Award
payloads.description: Fix-the-code graduation certificate generator - students fix hardcoded name variable bug

needsWork.title: Sowing to the Spirit (3D Car Game)
needsWork.issue: User reported it didn't work well - consider simplifying or replacing
needsWork.suggestion: The 3D mechanics may be too complex. Could convert to a simpler 2D driving game or fix the Three.js issues.
